title: Coding
content: Formerly a bio student hence no idea of coding have been suggested to start learning java what are the sources thank you

comments.body: Telusko youtube channel is very good for learning java.
Youtube feels like a rabbit hole from what i have seen from +1 +2 always gets distracted how about studying from books is that not optimal?
Reading books will not help if you are a beginner

CS50- its by Harvard, gold standard imo.   
Start it and dont look back.
